Merritt Coville

  1. Foster Name: Bud
  2. Foster Family: John and Mary Flessner
  3. Location of Family: Odell, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Fairbury, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: , NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Fairbury Journal, 29 June 1916; Fairbury Journal, 6 July 1916; Fairbury Journal, 13 July 1916; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; Social Security Death Notice.
